In England, in the seven days to 10 January, there were 836,100 new confirmed cases (1,478.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 January, there were 1,048,532 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 20% (212,432 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 January is 12,840,532 (22,706.5 cases per 100,000 population).
